meta.description: Disallow duplicate arguments in function definitions

content.introduction:
Disallow duplicate arguments infunctiondefinitions
✅RecommendedUsing therecommendedconfig from@eslint/jsin aconfiguration fileenables this rule
Table of ContentsRule DetailsHandled by TypeScriptVersionResources
If more than one parameter has the same name in a function definition, the last occurrence “shadows” the preceding occurrences. A duplicated name might be a typing error.
